title: Deleting Lockfile to Open League Client
body:
Hello Summoners, 

Lately, in order to open my league client, I have to open the package contents of my league client, deleted the lockfile, and then reopen to keep it from freezing mid-open. Is there any way to make it so I don't have to do this everytime I want to  open the client? I've already redownloaded, it didn't do anything. Suggestions?

replies.body: Lockfile still existing might indicate that your update went awry.  Double check any antivirus or third parties you might be running, it could be getting in the way.  If that doesn't help, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can get more context and work with you directly towards a fix.
